course_name: Middle Years of Schooling Curriculum: Teaching Social Education Part A
description: This course prepares students to teach the Australian History, Geography and Civics and Citizenship curricula in Upper Primary and Junior Secondary. It is also designed to give students the knowledge and skills to highlight the General Capabilities of Critical and Creative Thinking, Ethical Behaviour and Intercultural Understanding as well as the Cross Curriculum Priorities of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Cultures and Histories, Sustainability and Australia's Engagement with Asia.
restricted: This course is restricted to students in the Bed 4th year (MYS & Sec) and GradDipEd (MYS & Sec).
